description: Traces how an author's own prior works serve as conditions of possibility for their current arguments. Uses composed chains of capability engines to profile the target work, scan prior works with relationship-aware strategies, and synthesize findings through multi-stage analysis (cross-work synthesis, functional analysis, evolution tactics, conditions of possibility). Classifies each prior work's relationship type and adapts analysis accordingly. Each engine operates through analytical stances (discovery, inference, confrontation, architecture, integration, reflection, dialectical) at configurable depth levels (surface/standard/deep).

phases.phase_description: Comprehensive profiling of the target work through a 3-engine chain: (1) conceptual_framework_extraction maps vocabulary, methodology, metaphors, framing, conceptual architecture, and domain crossings; (2) concept_semantic_constellation maps semantic fields, concept clusters, boundary terms, and connotation landscapes; (3) inferential_commitment_mapper surfaces explicit/implicit commitments, conflicts, logical dependencies, and hidden implications. Each engine runs at the workflow's configured depth using its own multi-pass stance progression.
phases.base_phase_description: Comprehensive profiling of the target work through a multi-engine chain that maps vocabulary, methodology, metaphors, framing, semantic fields, concept clusters, and argumentative structure

phases.phase_description: Classify each prior work's relationship to the target (direct_precursor, indirect_contextualizer, methodological_ancestor, contradicted_position, parallel_development). Assesses relationship strength and influence channels (vocabulary, methodology, audience, authority, framing). Produces scanning strategies that determine how Pass 2 analyzes each work. Runs once per prior work, independent of Pass 1.
phases.base_phase_description: Classify each prior work's relationship to the target, assessing relationship strength and influence channels to produce scanning strategies

phases.phase_description: Scan each prior work for genealogical traces using a 2-engine chain: (1) concept_evolution performs dimensional comparison (vocabulary, methodology, metaphor, framing evolution, concept trajectory) informed by Pass 1 target profile; (2) concept_appropriation_tracker maps migration paths, semantic mutations, appropriation patterns, and recombination. Adapts strategy based on relationship classification from Pass 1.5. Runs once per prior work.
phases.base_phase_description: Scan each prior work for genealogical traces, performing dimensional comparison and concept appropriation tracking

phases.phase_description: Multi-stage analysis through a 4-engine sequential chain: (1) concept_synthesis aggregates per-work traces into cross-work evolution timelines, convergence/divergence maps, and semantic core analysis; (2) concept_taxonomy_argumentative_function classifies each conceptual chain's argumentative role (foundational/elaborative/defensive/bridge/culminative) and maps the argument's structural architecture; (3) evolution_tactics_detector identifies the author's 10+ intellectual self-management tactics with evidence chains; (4) conditions_of_possibility_analyzer performs Foucauldian analysis of enabling/constraining conditions, path dependencies, and counterfactuals.
phases.base_phase_description: Multi-stage analysis aggregating per-work traces into cross-work evolution timelines, argumentative function mapping, evolution tactics detection, and conditions of possibility analysis

phases.phase_description: Comprehensive genealogical synthesis: executive summary, genealogical portrait (Foucauldian descent + emergence narrative), per-idea genealogies with evolution timelines, author intellectual profile (prosopographic characterization), key findings, and reflexive methodological assessment. Consumes all upstream pass outputs to produce the final deliverable.
phases.base_phase_description: Comprehensive genealogical synthesis producing executive summary, genealogical portrait, per-idea genealogies, author intellectual profile, and reflexive methodological assessment

output_description: Comprehensive genealogical analysis: executive summary, per-idea evolution timelines, evolution tactics with evidence, conditions of possibility analysis, and synthesized genealogical portrait — all produced through composed capability engine chains with analytical stances at configurable depth
